## blockRendering.MarkerSvg.showWithField\_() method

Position and display the marker for a field. This is a box around the field.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected showWithField_(curNode: ASTNode): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  curNode | [ASTNode](./blockly.astnode.md) | The node to draw the marker for. |

void
